item.title: Visual Studio Hangs + SystemCertificates + Fiddler
item.description: For the last while I have been experiencing weird hangs with Visual Studio 2013. To try identify what was causing the hangs or at least where about the problem was I ran ProcMon.exe on devenv.exe and the point where Visual Studio hung I was getting the below output recursively
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Browsing localhost with the Microsoft Edge Browser
item.description: So if you using windows 10 and doing some web development you would probably have noticed that you can't browse localhost for some reason. And there is a couple of feedback items for it in the Windows Feedback app.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
